tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    user_id UUID,
    anonymized_user_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    amount DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    transaction_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE aggregated_data (
    analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    total_transactions INT,
    total_amount DECIMAL,
    security_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_data (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    amount DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    card_number VARCHAR(16),
    merchant_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE anonymized_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    anonymous_transaction_id INT,
    masked_card_number VARCHAR(16),
    merchant_id INT,
    aggregated_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE analysis_data (
    analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_date DATE,
    transaction_count INT,
    average_amount DECIMAL,
    alert_status BOOLEAN,
    security_score DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE gateway_performance (
    performance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    gateway_name VARCHAR(50),
    success_rate DECIMAL,
    latency_ms INT,
    error_rate DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE security_measures (
    measure_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    measure_name VARCHAR(50),
    measure_description TEXT,
    implementation_date DATE
)
